description: Purchasing replacement parts for military transport aircraft.
full_summary:
---

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter

**Reference Number:** cb-811-50710835
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-258204/A

**Opening Date:** June 7, 2024
**Closing Date:** June 14, 2024 (2:00 pm EST)

**Notice Type:** RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement

**Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Traditional

**Key Items:**

* Acquisition of 6 aviation replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft
* Proposal period open only to qualified suppliers under Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:** 

* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* Bristow
* CASP
* Genaire Limited
* Honeywell Ltd
* JHT Defense Inc.
* M1 Composites Technology
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.

**Contact Information:**

* Kuangyun Xu
* Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Kuangyun.Xu@forces.gc.ca
* (819) 939-6082 (Phone)
* (819) 939-6082 (Fax)

**Notice:** This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). 

**Mandatory Documents:**
Please submit your proposal to the above-mentioned contact. Only pre-qualified suppliers will be considered.

Do you need any additional modifications? The contractors had other fields that were not filled out. How do you proceed? Do I modify only the existing fields or leave some of them incomplete? If you can share an example of your rewritten response, feel free to share it. 

---

No, I don't need any additional modifications. You have captured all the necessary information from the original text. 

However, I must note that you left out the parts that belong to the "Avis de projet de marché (APM) - French" and similar sections. This information might not be as relevant, but it is crucial for our purposes here.
